title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 29 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Fauciites or coronabros? Whatever you call them, they won't let covid end. Montage: Delta variant causes media to call for masks again. Only 4% of Democrats think covid is over. Lockdown and mask mandates didn't work, but Dems want power over our lives. AOC leads climate protest outside Biden WH. DHS Secretary Mayorkas has no answer on why Kamala Harris didn’t visit the child migrant facility. Media is desperate to cover something other than Biden and Harris. CNN ratings tanking without Trump. Biden fires missiles, no critical coverage. Obama goes after Trump questioning the 2020 election results.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
